createjs.GlowFilter.name: createjs.GlowFilter
createjs.GlowFilter.description: Applies a GlowFilter to DisplayObjects of EaselJS. This filter has inherited the Filter class of EaselJS and has used BlurFilter of EaselJS at the blurring process.

params.name: color
params.description: The color of the glow. The default value is 0xFF0000. Valid values are in the hexadecimal format 0xRRGGBB.

params.name: alpha
params.description: The alpha transparency value for the glow color. Valid values are 0 to 1.

params.name: blurX
params.description: The amount of horizontal blur. The default value is 0. This value is passed to BlurFilter of EaselJS.

params.name: blurY
params.description: The amount of vertical blur. The default value is 0. This value is passed to BlurFilter of EaselJS.

params.name: strength
params.description: The strength of the glow. The default value is 1. Valid values are 0 to 255. But as for this value, a low value is more preferable.

params.name: quality
params.description: The number of blur iterations. The default value is 1. This value is passed to BlurFilter of EaselJS.

params.name: inner
params.description: Specifies whether the glow is an inner glow. The default value is false, expressing outer glow.

params.name: knockout
params.description: Specifies whether the object has a knockout effect. The default value is false, expressing no knockout effect.

example:
_shape = new createjs.Shape().set({x:centerX, y:centerY});
_shape.graphics.f("rgba(0,0,255,1)").dp(0, 0, 100, 5, 0.6, -90).ef();
var color = 0x00FFFF;
var alpha = 1;
var blurX = 32;
var blurY = 32;
var strength = 1;
var quality = 1;
var inner = false;
var knockout = false;
_glowFilter = new createjs.GlowFilter(color, alpha, blurX, blurY, strength, quality, inner, knockout);
_shape.filters = [_glowFilter];
_shape.cache(-100, -100, 200, 200);
_stage.addChild(_shape);

classitems.description: The color of the glow. The default value is 0xFF0000. Valid values are in the hexadecimal format 0xRRGGBB.
classitems.name: color

classitems.description: The amount of horizontal blur. The default value is 0. This value is passed to BlurFilter of EaselJS.
classitems.name: blurX

classitems.description: The amount of vertical blur. The default value is 0. This value is passed to BlurFilter of EaselJS.
classitems.name: blurY

classitems.description: The number of blur iterations. The default value is 1. This value is passed to BlurFilter of EaselJS.
classitems.name: quality

classitems.description: The alpha transparency value for the glow color. Valid values are 0 to 1.
classitems.name: alpha

classitems.description: The strength of the glow. The default value is 1. Valid values are 0 to 255. But as for this value, a low value is more preferable.
classitems.name: strength

classitems.description: Specifies whether the glow is an inner glow. The default value is false, expressing outer glow.
classitems.name: inner

classitems.description: Specifies whether the object has a knockout effect. The default value is false, expressing no knockout effect.
classitems.name: knockout

classitems.description:
Returns a rectangle with values indicating the margins required to draw the filter or null.
For example, a filter that will extend the drawing area 4 pixels to the left, and 7 pixels to the right
(but no pixels up or down) would return a rectangle with (x=-4, y=0, width=11, height=0).
classitems.name: getBounds

return.description: a rectangle object indicating the margins required to draw the filter or null if the filter does not effect bounds.

classitems.description: Applies the GlowFilter to the specified context.
classitems.name: applyFilter

params.name: ctx
params.description: The 2D context to use as the source.

params.name: x
params.description: The x position to use for the source rect.

params.name: y
params.description: The y position to use for the source rect.

params.name: width
params.description: The width to use for the source rect.

params.name: height
params.description: The height to use for the source rect.

params.name: targetCtx
params.description: The 2D context to draw the result to. Defaults to the context passed to ctx.

params.name: targetX
params.description: The x position to draw the result to. Defaults to the value passed to x.

params.name: targetY
params.description: The y position to draw the result to. Defaults to the value passed to y.

return.description: If the filter was applied successfully.

classitems.description: Returns a clone of this GlowFilter instance.
classitems.name: clone

return.description: A clone of this GlowFilter instance.

classitems.description: Returns a string representation of this filter.
classitems.name: toString

return.description: A string representation of this filter.
